name: Forest Creature #88
description: Each NFT from the 'RPine World of Future' collection is your key to the RPine DEX aggregator ecosystem, offering maximum cashback, referral rewards, and exclusive services. Owning this NFT unlocks unique opportunities within the innovative world of RPine.

attributes.value: Braided with glowing plants and moss
Pale with a greenish, luminescent hue
Futuristic armor intertwined with vines and moss
Leaves and vines growing from the hair and neck
Lush, mystical forest with soft, glowing light
Organic moss, leaves, and metallic components
A tranquil and magical blend of nature and technology
